meanings.definition: Capable of being addressed or referred to
meanings.sent1: The addressable envelope had the recipient's name clearly written on it.
meanings.sent2: The addressable label made it easy to find the correct file.
meanings.sent3: The addressable post-it note kept reminding me of the important meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an addressable beacon in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The addressable sign pointed us in the right direction.

meanings.definition: Able to be accessed or targeted for communication or action
meanings.sent1: The addressable website allowed users to easily find information.
meanings.sent2: The addressable phone number connected customers to the support team.
meanings.sent3: The addressable mailbox seemed to have a mind of its own, opening whenever it pleased.
meanings.sent4: His words were like addressable arrows, hitting the target every time.
meanings.sent5: The addressable button triggered the launch sequence.
